content:
The Lady Vols took advantage of an easywin opportunity Tuesday night

against South Carolina PERIOD

Tennessee hammered the Gamecocks  in the final game of a fivegame

homestand PERIOD

Tennessee   SEC has now won nine of its last  games and appears

to be positioning itself for a top NCAA Tournament seed once again PERIOD

The Lady Vols started off slowly against USC falling behind  and not

connecting from the field for nearly four minutes PERIOD

Tiffani Johnsons layup with  remaining in the first half precipitated

a  Lady Vol run which gave UT a  advantage with just under five

minutes left PERIOD

Both teams shot well in the first half but the Gamecocks wilted under

Tennessees pressure defense and turned the ball over  times PERIOD UT head

coach Pat Summitt credited her young backcourt with stepping up its

defensive intensity PERIOD

 Summitt

said PERIOD 

Holdsclaw once again played a solid allaround game scoring  points and

adding a gamehigh  rebounds and five steals but it was her defense that

stood out PERIOD

 Summitt said PERIOD 

Senior Abby Conklin has also turned her game up a notch adjusting well to

her role as the first woman off the bench PERIOD Conklin scored  points and

collected eight rebounds in just  minutes of action PERIOD

 Summitt said PERIOD



The Lady Vols were a force in the second half versus USC PERIOD Tennessee

extended a  halftime advantage into a  lead and overwhelmed the

Gamecocks with its tenacity on both ends of the court PERIOD

Tennessee forced  Gamecock turnovers and turned them into  points PERIOD

 Conklin said PERIOD 

The Lady Vols were also aided by Tiffani Johnsons solid performance PERIOD The

junior recovered from two lackluster offensive performances and had 

points and six rebounds PERIOD

South Carolina   was led by Nikki Miars and Lisa Williams who

scored  and  points respectively PERIOD

The Lady Vols next face a road test as they travel to Auburn on Saturday PERIOD

The Lady Vols havent played a road game in three weeks and will once again

be without point guard Laurie Milligan who is still recovering from an

injury to her right patella PERIOD
